definition: of or relating to whales and dolphins etc, large aquatic carnivorous mammal with fin-like forelimbs no hind limbs, including: whales
details:
adjective
- of or relating to whales and dolphins etc
= synonyms: cetaceous
noun
- large aquatic carnivorous mammal with fin-like forelimbs no hind limbs, including: whales
= synonyms: cetacean mammal
